JobFullDesc: The newly formed WebXT organization encompasses Bing, Edge Browser and Microsoft Content services used by nearly a billion users across the Globe. Drive is staple to how we run the business in WebXT and there’s immense thirst from engineering, data science, business development and partners across Microsoft to have their data insight questions answered in a fast, accurate and easily digestible fashion. If you seek opportunity to make direct business impact in major AI driven products in Microsoft, come and join the Bing Metrics and Insights team as a Senior Data Scientist to drive user and engagement growth strategies with data. You will have access to one of the largest data sets in the world to distill insights to drive new opportunities, understand success/failure impact of features and shape business strategies to grow users and engagements through distinguishing growth features like MS Rewards, Edge browser optimization, search driven from content. You will work very closely with data mining/platform, feature engineering, marketing, and finance/business teams to complete the positive, data-driven feedback loop to 1) drive ideation with feature teams for opportunities 2) direct and course correct engineering plans based on impact analysis and 3) inform business visions with data.Responsibilitieso Hands on analysis on large volumes of telemetry data using various algorithms and tools including your own o Drive data driven ideation for Rewards and Bing/Content/Edge growth teams to acquire new users and increase daily habits for existing ones o Drive impact analysis for features critical to agile course correction and business investmentso Define and track key org level success metrics for impact and drive reliable process to track contribution from individual feature initiatives across the product lifecycle against set goals o Evangelize your data analysis techniques, visualizations across teamsQualificationsRequired Qualifications:o 5+ years of industry experience in driving business growth through applied data science/analysis o Technical expertise in working with big data, modern data analysis techniques and tools with solid understanding of math/statistics fundamentals (e.g. A/B testing)o Strong communication skills to articulate insights and vision, solid story telling with data and influencing and building partnerships with
